body.p:
431
Jany. 4 3
Lieut Thos P. Young
Coy A. 4th Ky Infy
Sir,

Yours with enclosures received in consequence of your long silence in not accepting the position of Adjutant of the 49th Infy. another man has been commissioned and your commission has been cancelled -- I am instructed by the Governor to say that whenever an opportunity offers for your promotion it will receive his attention.

Respy
Your obedt Servt.
John Boyle
Adjt Genl of Ky
